channel.title: Weard random error?!?!?!
channel.description: [code]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 4000 at client.addSkillXP(client.java:13138) at client.objectClick(client.java:1791) at client.DoAction(client.java:1181) at client.process(client.java:17593) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:137) at server.main(server.java:48)[/code] anyone knows how i can fix i get this when i run my server and then ppl play and randomly this comes
